actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: Until a stryx speaks or opens its mouth, it is indistinguishable from a normal owl.

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: The stryx doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the stryx's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can cast the following spell, requiring no components:

3/day: comprehend languages

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
special_abilities.desc: The stryx has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.
